name: combojs
description: A combobox for intelligent, responsive search and filtering.
author: Asger Hallas

scripts.clean: npm run clean_test& npm run clean_lib
scripts.\\: COMPILE ALL AND START WATCH COMMANDS IN NEW WINDOWS
scripts.watch: npm run clean_lib& start npm run stylus_lib& start npm run coffee_lib& start npm run coffee_tests
scripts.\\: RUN NIGHTWATCH WITH HIDDEN CHROME BROWSER, FOR LOCAL TDD DEVELOPMENT ONLY
scripts.nightwatch: title nightwatch & nightwatch --config ./tests/nightwatch.json -e chrome& nightwatch --config ./tests/nightwatch.json -e ie& nightwatch --config ./tests/nightwatch.json -e firefox
scripts.pretest: npm run clean_test & npm run watch
scripts.start: npm run watch & timeout 1 & start npm run testwatch
